list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a place, typically a large, deep pit, from which stone or other materials are or have been extracted.
an animal pursued by a hunter, hound, predatory mammal, or bird of prey.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: grouse are not an easy quarry for a hawk
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Grouse không phải là một mỏ đá dễ dàng cho một con chim ưng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a diamond-shaped pane of glass as used in lattice windows.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: mỏ đá màu với họa tiết hoa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: extract (stone or other materials) from a quarry.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: limestone is quarried for use in blast furnaces
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đá vôi được khai thác để sử dụng trong lò cao
